metadata.title: CVE-2015-8957 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in ImageMagick before 6.9.0-4 Beta allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted SUN file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagick++-6.q16-5v5 - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickcore-6.q16-2 - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickcore-6.q16-2-extra - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
libmagickwand-6.q16-2 - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
perlmagick - 8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.8.9.9-7ubuntu5.2').
